entry.title: New release for Social-to-Mealie: v0.2.0
entry.content:

entry.title: New release for Social-to-Mealie: v0.5.0 Reduced 300mb for the container
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add ios shortcut by @GerardPolloRebozado in https://github.com/GerardPolloRebozado/social-to-mealie/pull/13
  • Add github sponsor button by @GerardPolloRebozado in https://github.com/GerardPolloRebozado/social-to-mealie/pull/14
  • feat: :sparkles: Migrated to nextjs and solved issue with trailing sl… by @GerardPolloRebozado in https://github.com/GerardPolloRebozado/social-to-mealie/pull/17
  • fix: :green_heart: Restored github workflow by @GerardPolloRebozado in https://github.com/GerardPolloRebozado/social-to-mealie/pull/18
  • feat: :sparkles: Improved error reporting by adding a card that show … by @GerardPolloRebozado in https://github.com/GerardPolloRebozado/social-to-mealie/pull/19

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GerardPolloRebozado/social-to-mealie/compare/v0.4.0...v0.5.0
